content: you will see that each row decreases from here start with a chain 3 in the first space then immediately begin a 3-double_crochet cluster in the next space to finish each row don t chain just make 1 double_crochet in the last space round 12 this is just the tiny point of each star simply chain 3 and then double_crochet in the next space pull the yarn through the last loop to tie off finishing tuck in all ends from joining new colors/attaching shirt strips i used my fingers rather than a hook if you need to shape/block spray lightly with water and use your hands to pull it to shape i would recommend hand washing outside with the hose and laying flat to dry you could use a washing machine too if you have a gentle version 4 pattern diagram open circle = chain closed circle = slip_stitch t with one notch = double_crochet small solid triangle = join yarn the author has licensed this page under a creative commons license some rights reserved this pattern is for the sole use of the pattern purchaser and not to be used for commercial production of any kind please contact even howard at even@evenhoward com if you are interested in a cottage license for charity work 5
